aboutUs.text1: LangDay is a mobile application for learning new languages.
aboutUs.text2: Its purpose is to help you learn a language, by enriching your vocabulary. The way this is done, is simply by showing different words in a selected language, every day.

wordDisplay.text1: Congratulations on the {{progress}} new words you learned.
wordDisplay.text2: Next goal: Increase learned words to {{progress + 10}}.
